title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Whisk eggs with cheese. Combine everything and season.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt & spices. Grill until cooked. Make sauce from tomato puree, cream, and paste. Add chicken to sauce and simmer.
